description:
Having quit table tennis, Peco hangs around Tamura Table Tennis Hall eating snacks.
Meanwhile, Smile polishes his skills with Koizumi in order to win, causing discord between himself and his teammates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Omae Dare yori Takkyuu Suki Jan yo!!
Tu aimes le ping-pong plus que quiconque !!
You Love This Sport More Than Anyone!!
おまえ誰より卓球好きじゃんよ!!
